original: @183b * // thugs rje chen po bkra shis kun du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @183b * // thugs rje chen po bkra shis kun du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the auspicious all-illuminating great compassion.

original: de nas kun du snang ba bkra shis byed //
analyzed: de nas kun du snang ba bkra shis byed //
translated: Then, the all-illuminating auspiciousness is performed.

original: ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
translated: The method of practice should be explained as it occurs.

original: slob dpon gang zhig gdul bya'i don mthong bas blo rab tu phyogs te ;
analyzed: slob dpon gang zhig gdul bya'i don mthong bas blo rab tu phyogs te ;
translated: The master, seeing the purpose of the disciples, turns the mind

original: bsil khang gi rnga yab lta bur gzhan gyi dbang gis g-yo zhing mi brtan pa thob pa na /
analyzed: bsil khang gi rnga yab lta bur gzhan gyi dbang gis g-yo zhing mi brtan pa thob pa na /
translated: and, like a fan in a pavilion, moves and is unstable by the power of others.

original: des bdag la dad cing ltos pa dor ba rnams kyi don du 'phags pa zla ba'i kha dog can yid la byas la /
analyzed: des bdag la dad cing ltos pa dor ba rnams kyi don du 'phags pa zla ba'i kha dog can yid la byas la /
translated: Then, for the sake of those who have abandoned faith and reliance on oneself, one should bring to mind the noble one with the color of the moon.

original: dkar po'i tshes brgyad dang bcu dang bco lnga la ji snyed 'byor pa'i yo byad dang ldan pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas byin gyis @184a * //üîΩbrlab par bya'o //üîΩbkra shis bzang dang bkra shis nor 'bru sman //
analyzed: dkar po'i tshes brgyad dang bcu dang bco lnga la ji snyed 'byor pa'i yo byad dang ldan pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas byin gyis @184a * // brlab par bya'o // bkra shis bzang dang bkra shis nor 'bru sman //
translated: On the eighth, tenth, and fifteenth of the bright fortnight, with whatever resources one has, one should bless the pleasing place.üîΩAuspicious good, auspicious wealth, grain, and medicine,

original: bkra shis mchod rdzas dang ni bkra shis brgyan //
analyzed: bkra shis mchod rdzas dang ni bkra shis brgyan //
translated: auspicious offering substances, and auspicious ornaments.

original: dpal ldan bkra shis dkyil 'khor cher bri la //
analyzed: dpal ldan bkra shis dkyil 'khor cher bri la //
translated: The glorious and auspicious one, the great ma·πá·∏çala, is drawn.üîΩThe king of auspiciousness, Avalokite≈õvara, is invoked.

original: bkra shis rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang dgug / gang dag gang gi phyir dang gang du ji ltar bya ba'i rang bzhin thams cad la bkra shis zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: bkra shis rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang dgug / gang dag gang gi phyir dang gang du ji ltar bya ba'i rang bzhin thams cad la bkra shis zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Whatever, for whatever purpose, wherever, and however it is done, all is auspicious.

original: shis pa brjod pa'i dbyangs dang sems dang rjes su mthun pa'i rol mo dang glus mchod do //
analyzed: shis pa brjod pa'i dbyangs dang sems dang rjes su mthun pa'i rol mo dang glus mchod do //
translated: One should make offerings with auspicious melodies, music and songs that accord with the mind.

original: me tog dkar dmar dang tsandan dkar dmar dang rgyan dang dri'i khyad par nges pa'o //
analyzed: me tog dkar dmar dang tsandan dkar dmar dang rgyan dang dri'i khyad par nges pa'o //
translated: White and red flowers, white and red sandalwood, ornaments, and special fragrances are definite.

original: yo byad glo bur ba dang gsar du skyes pa mtha' dag la rgyal bar gyur pa'i tshig sngon du song bas so //
analyzed: yo byad glo bur ba dang gsar du skyes pa mtha' dag la rgyal bar gyur pa'i tshig sngon du song bas so //
translated: All the sudden and newly arisen articles are preceded by the words 'may there be victory'.

original: sbyin bdag gam slob ma'i lus bkrus la bkra shis kun du snang ba'i rgyas gdab po //
analyzed: sbyin bdag gam slob ma'i lus bkrus la bkra shis kun du snang ba'i rgyas gdab po //
translated: The body of the patron or disciple is washed and sealed with the all-illuminating auspiciousness.

original: dge ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar //
analyzed: dge ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar //
translated: The white, round ma·πá·∏çala of virtue

original: kun du 'od mdzad thugs rje che //
analyzed: kun du 'od mdzad thugs rje che //
translated: is all-illuminating, of great compassion,

original: bkra shis brgyad ldan padmo 'dzin //
analyzed: bkra shis brgyad ldan padmo 'dzin //
translated: holding the lotus with the eight auspicious symbols,

original: sa gnon ting 'dzin mchog gis brjid //
analyzed: sa gnon ting 'dzin mchog gis brjid //
translated: radiant with the supreme samƒÅdhi of touching the earth.

original: de nas 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad la gdugs la sogs pa brgyad do //
analyzed: de nas 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad la gdugs la sogs pa brgyad do //
translated: Then, on the eight spokes of the wheel, there are the eight things such as the parasol.

original: mu khyud la grub pa nyi shu'o //
analyzed: mu khyud la grub pa nyi shu'o //
translated: On the rim, there are the twenty accomplishments.

original: steng nas bkra shis kyi rdzas sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs pa lha'i sku brgya stong phrag mang po'o //
analyzed: steng nas bkra shis kyi rdzas sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs pa lha'i sku brgya stong phrag mang po'o //
translated: Above, there are many hundreds of thousands of divine bodies that rain down a variety of auspicious substances.

original: mchod pa'i sprin du ma las 'brug sgra dal bus sgrogs pa dang / glog 'byin pa yang 'god par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i sprin du ma las 'brug sgra dal bus sgrogs pa dang / glog 'byin pa yang 'god par bya'o //
translated: One should also arrange clouds of offerings, slow-sounding thunder, and lightning.

original: 'og nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pas bum pa nor bus gang ba 'bul pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: 'og nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pas bum pa nor bus gang ba 'bul pa'i tshul lo //
translated: Below, there is the manner of the ocean nƒÅga king and so on offering vases filled with jewels.

original: rdo rje slob dpon kun du snang //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon kun du snang //
translated: The vajra master is all-illuminating.

original: bkra shis rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
analyzed: bkra shis rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
translated: Auspicious Vairocana

original: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te //üîΩsngags brjod bum pa dgu gang bya //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te // sngags brjod bum pa dgu gang bya //
translated: enters into equipoise in samƒÅdhiüîΩand recites the mantra, filling the nine vases.

original: bum pa gang ba dgu la sngags kyi phreng ba dgu dgu bzhu bas byin gyis brlab po //
analyzed: bum pa gang ba dgu la sngags kyi phreng ba dgu dgu bzhu bas byin gyis brlab po //
translated: In the nine filled vases, the nine strings of the mantra are melted and blessed.

original: rdzas snod dang bcud ma lus pa la ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rdo rjes mtshan pa re res brgyan par ro //
analyzed: rdzas snod dang bcud ma lus pa la ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rdo rjes mtshan pa re res brgyan par ro //
translated: All the vessels and their contents are adorned with a jeweled vajra marked with a syllable A.

original: phyag dang bskor ba byas nas bgegs bsal te bkra shis sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag dang bskor ba byas nas bgegs bsal te bkra shis sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Having made prostrations and circumambulations, one should remove obstacles and bestow auspiciousness.

original: rdo rje dril bu dpa' thogs la //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu dpa' thogs la //
translated: Holding the vajra and bell,üîΩone should move about, completely surrounded by compassion.

original: snying rjes kun du bskor zhing rgyug / gnas dang gang zag rnal 'byor rnams //
analyzed: snying rjes kun du bskor zhing rgyug / gnas dang gang zag rnal 'byor rnams //
translated: For the places, persons, and yogins,
